thread.title: BRIEF-E.I.D-Parry (India) Seeks Nod For Divestment Of Stake In Parry America To Coromandel International

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-E.I.D-Parry (India) Seeks Nod For Divestment Of Stake In Parry America To Coromandel International

organizations.name: divestment of stake in parry america to coromandel international

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - E.I.D-Parry (India) Ltd:
* E.I.D-PARRY (INDIA) - SEEKS SHAREHOLDERS’ NOD FOR ‍SALE OF CO‘S BIO PESTICIDES BUSINESS AS A GOING CONCERN VIA SLUMP SALE TO COROMANDEL INTERNATIONAL​
* E.I.D-PARRY (INDIA) - SEEKS SHAREHOLDERS’ NOD FOR DIVESTMENT OF STAKE OF CO IN PARRY AMERICA TO COROMANDEL INTERNATIONAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
